title: Note-Ify Notes 1.42 – Simple Markdown based note-talking app
content: Note-Ify Notes is a simple Markdown based note-talking app. Write down ideas while you work. Keep a diary. Write memos and practice “freewriting”. title: Doppel 1.4 – High-speed duplicate detector
content: Doppel finds duplicates fast. Really fast. It uses custom-developed specialist algorithms to process hundreds of thousands of files, and terabytes of data, in seconds; and a high-speed index to reduce disc accesses and increase speed of subsequent scans.   A simple interface, that would be recognisable to any Mac user, makes Doppel easy and intuitive […]

title: Uploader for Instagram 1.4.2 – post images to Instagram
content: Uploader for Instagram lets you easy share photo on Instagram ,and can view comment of photos.   Version 1.4.2: Minor bugs fixed.   OS X 10.10 or later, 64-bit processor

title: ScrollStickies 2.05 – Resizable Reminders, notes, clippings stickies on your desktop
content: A sticker/post it app with a teleprompter-like text scrolling mode!   Leave as many colorful, resizable stickies on your desktop with reminders, notes, clippings as you want. Contents are automatically saved with backups and can be restored at startup. Includes a very useful teleprompter mode that allows single line scrolling text.   Version 2.05: an […]

title: Go Word 1.6 – for Microsoft Word Edition and Open Office Format
content: Go Word is a beautiful, easy-to-use text editor that is designed to make writing convenient, efficient and comfortable.   Go Word is ease, fast and uncluttered. It starts up quickly, has a live word count, easy on the eyes and you can export all the common formats: .pdf, .rtf, .doc, .txt and more .   […]

title: Tipard M2TS Converter 3.8.13 – Convert Any M2TS to MP4
content: Tipard M2TS Converter is designed professionally to convert any AVCHD M2TS files recorded from HD video camcorders such as Canon, Panasonic HDC, and Sony HDR, etc. to MP4, WMV, AVI, MKV, MOV, FLV, MPEG, 3GP, HD MP4, HD MOV, HD WMV, HD MKV and other video formats with super-fast speed and high quality.   It […]

title: SystemDoctor 3.0 – Mac Optimization Tool
content: SystemDoctor is a useful utility App to optimize your Mac. It can scan and clean the unused files and big files. Help you take back more disk space.   Version 3.0: Use new Logo and UI; Add scan big files function.   OS X 10.11 or later, 64-bit processor

title: Flying Logic Pro 3.0.2 – A spreadsheet-style reasoning tool
content: Flying Logic Pro is a highly visual, easy-to-use software application that does for reasoning what spreadsheets do for numbers.
